website_summaries.verdict: An easy way to make lactose-free butter coffee, though it is pricy.
pros: For those who like to make butter or coconut oil coffee, this unique creamer makes it easy
People who follow ketogenic, paleo, or low-carb diets may enjoy this organic creamer made out of ghee, coconut oil, and MCT oil
Lightly sweetened with organic stevia and natural vanilla flavoring
cons: It doesn't replicate the creamy dairy texture enough for some users

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy, cheap way to get butter coffee.
customer_reviews.text: After doing keto with 22/2 intermittent fasting it seemed odd to have some calories in the morning but this really helped. My rare afternoon hunger has completely vanished and the weight is dropping off even faster. Using a hand frother works fine but it will separate as the coffee cools. Using a real blender seems to keep it from happening.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought power creamer to make bulletproof coffee with. The product isn't like your traditional creamer, it's a blend of ghee and mct oil. I love that I am able to just put a tablespoon in my cup and be done! I'm not having to do the measuring of butter and then coconut oil. It did really well and blended nicely into my coffee. It added a richness to the coffee but didn't have a true taste! I love this product! I find it gives me energy and great mental clarity. Couldn't recommend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austen

customer_reviews.title: Decent Cup of Joe
customer_reviews.text: First off only my 2nd cup of coffee with Omega Power Creamer (Sweet Vanilla) and initial impressions are good. I blend it in my Ninja blender for 20-30 seconds and the works out pretty well. Flavor is good, not overly sweet. For someone who usually drinks his coffee black with not additives I was afraid it would be to "flavored", not the case IMO. The reason I gave it a rating of 3/5 was how it arrived to me yesterday. It had been rough handled in shipping and the container had 2 significant dents in it and the cap was broken. I had to split the container in half and scoop contents into a tupperware container for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Barry B

customer_reviews.title: EASY way to start your day!
customer_reviews.text: Finally an easier, faster way to make my coffee Bulletproof! All you do is shake it up, squirt a tablespoon in your coffee, blend, and off you go! It tastes delicious and gives you such an energy boost without the crash. If you are following the Bulletproof diet, or just looking to skip breakfast but still feel strong healthy and energized, this is the way to go. Sometimes I'll add a few drops ofor peppermint mocha liquid stevia for a yummy twist...but just using the Omega PowerCreamer by itself is yummy too. Hope this review helps!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bulletproof butter coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I used to like my coffee with the full flavored creamer and sugar (or Stevia really), but had to switch to something different when I went on the awesome Bulletproof diet, which prescribes butter coffee. I didn't think I could make the switch, but I really like it, and don't miss the old stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Krkn

customer_reviews.title: Over-Priced
customer_reviews.text: I bought the vanilla creamer, I didn't taste a any hint of vanilla whatsoever. I have gotten better flavor from Kerry Gold butter & Organic coconut oil by doing it myself. The cost for the amount you get was way over priced in my opinion. On the other hand can understand the pricing due to the Ghee that is in it. But I'm not buying it again, $19.00 for the bottle is a bit much. I bought a 50/50 Ghee & Coconut oil blend from Thrive for $9.00, and add that to my coffee and it is really creamy and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but don’t use it in cold brew!
customer_reviews.text: The product tastes great and works well in HOT coffee! Don’t put this in your cold brew and expect it to work... it solidifies into chunks and floats on top. Thinking about the ingredients, that makes perfect sense, though. Otherwise, great for keto breakfast on the run.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peter

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product is more liquid like than creamy similar to melted ghee. The taste is just “okay” but I had to add in some cream to make my coffee taste better. Im also not enjoying the stevia aftertaste. I’m personally not loving this product and wouldn’t buy again. I can make a much better cup of coffee with my own erythritol, cream and cinnamon.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I have expected
customer_reviews.text: So I bought power creamer to make bulletproof coffee with. The product isn't like your traditional creamer, it's a blend of ghee and mct oil. I love that I am able to just put a tablespoon in my cup and be done! I'm not having to do the measuring of butter and then coconut oil. It did really well and blended nicely into my coffee. It added a richness to the coffee but didn't have a true taste! I love this product! I find it gives me energy and great mental clarity. Couldn't recommend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. Everyone has commented on the price of it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Everyone has commented on the price of it, however if you break down the ingriendeints in it, it’s much cheaper! Coconut oil, mct oil, ghee, all of that in its natural form is very expensive! Thanks omega, for making an amazing product and keeping me in keto while on the run and away on vacation!! It’s easy, convienent, and tastes amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: jillian

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but I just didn’t like it. I have been using MCT oil powder in my coffee for several months and rely on the mental boost it gives me each morning. I just didn’t like the taste or get the same boost from this product. I went back to my tried and true MCT product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L Kocher

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel, great taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it! Especially when we are camping or traveling and don't want to drag along the ingredients separately. It also doesn't leak. We will buy more in the future for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Sindy

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that it doesn't have to be refrigerated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this be able to have my keto coffee while I was on a business trip. This works perfectly. I love the fact that it doesn't have to be refrigerated. It tastes great and the other bonus is that it is Whole30 compliant!
customer_reviews.author: mk_tanis

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this and try it out I almost paid for express shipping. What a disappointment! I tried blending it with ice, hot. I wasted so much trying to get it palatable and it is still awful. I guess to each their own as so many people love it in the reviews but as for me, it's AWFUL! Will absolutely never purchase again, I have had much better luck with other keto coffee creamers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I could give a 3.5 I would
customer_reviews.text: This didn't really taste like anything like I was hoping from the other reviews. I just don't enjoy this. I usually use coffee booster brand and I loved it, thought I would give this a try. It's most likely just a person taste thing that's got me but I just didn't enjoy this very much. But it smells delicious. Nothing against it, it's a wonderful product and is what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Dakotah

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit costly but I am glad I bought it. It's nice to have a healthy alternative to creamers, and while it is 100% and therefore 120 calories per T, I find room for it in my diet. I use a tsp and a half in black coffee. I have always hated black coffee, but this makes it delicious. I'm really quite amazed.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyBrookTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, no overwhelming stevia sweetness
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this. I used a milk frothier to blend a couple of tablespoons of heavy whipping cream with a tablespoon of this creamer and it was delicious. The best part is that it wasn’t overwhelmingly sweet. I usually mix Pruvit’s Keto Kreme with hwc but I can only handle about a tsp at a time because the stevia is overwhelming. This product is perfect and inexpensive, so I’m glad to be able to switch things up.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Miller

customer_reviews.title: Store flip-lid bottle upright.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to provide the needed Medium Chain Triglycerides to sustain my fat burning while at my too busy for breaks work shift, and away from the comforts of home. This product has been for me very useful in my coffee and other warm beverage drinks on the go. The bottle needs to be stored in an upright position to prevent possible seepage into a lunch bag or tote. The bottle cap opening tends to accumulate oil overflow under the flip lid that can be messy. I do recommend this product, and I have had the Pumpkin Spice, Vanilla, and Peppermint Mocha flavors to date with Pumpkin Spice as my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: william roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great with hot drinks and food.
customer_reviews.text: I love ice coffee but this did not do it any justice. I do love it in my hot chocolate. I never can stomach warm coffee. I think this is meant for warm drinks. I love this in my oatmeal. The smell is so magical. Would love to keep purchasing. Photo added to cold coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Soles_Toes

customer_reviews.title: No...no...no.
customer_reviews.text: Imagine movie theater buttered popcorn...now imagine pouring that fake butter in your coffee and then choking it down. I tried so hard to like this due to so many positive reviews, but I can't get past the flavor - there's something that tastes artificial. Also doesn't blend well - tried a spoon and a frother - nada...just really disappointed. Regular MCT oil blends a lot better. EVEN MORE disappointing? While it's labeled as 'prime' this item is not eligible for returns. So now I'm out $20 : (
customer_reviews.author: BB73

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and Creamy
customer_reviews.text: The creamer was definitely creamy and tasted of vanilla. However, I realized that while I don't dislike the flavor of ghee in my coffee, it ruins ghee for me on other food. After I tried this, I used some regular ghee on some crab legs I'd made and I could taste how sweet and oily the ghee was. I'd never noticed that before and really enjoyed ghee before using this product. I was, consequently, unable to enjoy ghee in other ways. So, I probably wont order this again because it ruins ghee for me and I don't want that, but if that doesn't bother you, this was definitely a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok... way expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this bc I loved concept. Not sure I’d purchase again bc it’s super expensive for what u get. If u lessen serving amount it somewhat defeats purpose of using product. Won’t last too long at all. The flavor is good, exceptional not really. I’d like to buy again but it’s outta budget range for me :( I remain on the hunt for a more reasonably priced product or just go back to my old way; coconut oil, vanilla extract and/or bean, Califia vanilla creamer. Add spoon of Chocti 4th & Heart into magic bullet and blend. Take extra few mins but tastes better and way cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Koz

customer_reviews.title: I’m sold on this!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter originally brought the Pumpkin Spice version of this keto creamer home. She goes on and off keto so I decided to sample some since it was just sitting there! I loved it! It was spicy and buttery and just great in a cup of chai. I don’t like flavored coffee and that’s what prompted me to buy the unflavored one. I was hoping to find something that I can leave it my desk for the times that I want a cup of coffee at work. This totally fits what I was hoping it would be. It’s just the right buttery flavor, and it’s free of chemicals and nonsense. I will definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: limegreenolives

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this. I'm very sad to say it broke ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. I'm very sad to say it broke me out with cystic acne! It was the only thing new in my routine and as soon as I stopped using it I cleared up. I'm in my 40's and have learned at this point that ingesting coconut oil or using it topically causes bad breakouts as it is very acnegic. I was hoping that ghee being the first ingredient would be a winner for me. The taste was fine though. Too bad I just wasted $20. Plus, be careful, this seller does not allow returns!
customer_reviews.author: Moser6

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR KETO DIET AND BULLETPROOF COFFEE
customer_reviews.text: I follow a ketogenic diet so when I watched a youtuber putting this stuff in his coffee I had to try, no joke the guy is great and so is this creamer blend. I used to use 2-3 products to make a bulletproof coffee every day but it this I've only had to use one ingredient. I like the taste, coconut with a hint of salty butter is how I would explain it. I posted to Instagram that I had made the purchase of the original power creamer and they commented right away about how to use their product and other flavors they offer. I will continue to use this product and maybe eve try other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Add The Needed Creamy Texture
customer_reviews.text: I can't say this creamer is tasteless, but there is not an overpowering flavor either. What it does is add a silkier texture to my coffee which works for me. As for blending, I've not had any trouble. I just stir from the bottom for a bit longer than usual and the creamer has dissolved pretty well. I also use a frother on occasion which definitely breaks up any clumps. I take this when I travel and it's a perfect solution for Keto on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Jinna

customer_reviews.title: Helps With Keto
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It’s a bit too expensive to use everyday, unless I use a half serving, but I enjoy the flavor very much. I usually mix it with heavy cream and/or some MCT oil in my coffee. It fills me up in the mornings and keeps me satiated until my next meal.
customer_reviews.author: TxAggieproud

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: It seems like it is really expensive but when considering the prick of the ingredients or comparing it to buying a latte it really is not that bad. I just have to confine myself to only one serving per day so I can afford to use it. The good news is that I need to drink less coffee anyway. I put one TBSP in my travel mug that holds 18 oz. so that is really good. I will be buying this in the future on a regular basis. I got the Regular and the Chocolate and alternate days.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: LEAKY PACKAGING AND CANNOT RETURN IT
customer_reviews.text: first of all, this is not a creamer. this is melted butter. there is no creamy taste. save your $20 and mix melted ghee and some vanilla, and some sugar substitute. if you do decided to spend that $20 on this little bottle, be prepared for it to spill all over your box of other amazon items you purchased, then realize you won't get a refund or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible substitute for vanilla creamer!
customer_reviews.text: My nutritionist recommended this product as part of my new diet plan. First thing I noticed was how expensive it is. Then I found it does not blend with the coffee - forms an oil slick and tastes terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Rancid oil) :
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product, because it was like an all in one ; however when it arrived it was so sweet, too much Stevia! And also about halfway through the bottle I noticed it started tasting really rancid, and since I know better I did not continue to use it. When an oil gets rancid it is no longer safe to consume unless you want to promote inflammation in your body! I could not see any way to contact the seller and I was not able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good for keto
customer_reviews.text: You have to use a blender otherwise you won’t get the nice froth on top. I also have to add some cream to it, otherwise it’s not creamy enough for me. It mixes nicely with a frother wand so it’s not too oily, it just doesn’t produce much of a froth without a blender. It’s convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jen A.

customer_reviews.title: Replaces other unhealthy creamers
customer_reviews.text: Having been addicted to the delicious creamers made for coffee, it was very hard to enjoy coffee without them, until I found this creamer. The bitterness from coffee was so hard to cover without lots of sugary creamers, not matter what brand of coffee. Unwilling to give up coffee, when I put a dab of this creamer in coffe along with coconut cream, I was in coffee heaven again! Seriously you need very little, and it’s wonderful. Will have this delivered on a regular basis. Don’t do what I did and put it in the fridge. Keep it room temp for easy smooth drizzling. I think I’ll have another cup of coffe now. Yum.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Costa

customer_reviews.title: Overall
customer_reviews.text: The flavor doesn't really hint at vanilla and has a strong artificial sugar after taste. It does have a nice coconut smell. Don't expect it to blend well as it just kind of floats at the top, I put it in a big cup and used a fork to kind of rapidly whisk it and it worked. Also I don't think it should be called creamer because it doesn't give your coffee any creamy or milkyness at all. Your coffee will just be black. It wasn't the worst and it wasn't the best. For some of us it's just blah, while it wows others, everyone has different taste buds therefore you just have to try it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: melisa lopez

customer_reviews.title: All hype!!  Drat! I did not research this:  health benefits NOT proven...none.
customer_reviews.text: I just spent $ to buy all saturated fats to raise my cholesterol, calorie intake., and no PROVEN BENEFITS for weight loss. all for a "hip" substance. Look at ALL research, and bibliographies before you buy, then choose . I love my arteries and heart. I did not give it a full rating b/.c I won't eat it. Knowing what I know now...yuck.
customer_reviews.author: M.L. Powers, MS

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting & helped with keto
customer_reviews.text: I was having a really hard time kicking my coffee creamer habit. And it was blocking my from keto success. Using this vanilla flavored creamer was the answer. I am losing weight and enjoying my coffee. While it is not the same tasting as my bad but beloved chemical and sugar laden creamer, this add richness, flavor and a hint of sweet. Enjoying my coffee while losing weight. Thank you - off to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Yummy!!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second bottle and love it! I add a tablespoon to each cup of coffee along with heavy whipping cream and it tastes amazing!! I am doing keto so this was an easy way for me make a keto type coffee. Only thing is when I received the second bottle for some reason the mixture seemed more chunky and some of it got stuck when it came out. Not sure what happen this time around but either way I’ll continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and satisfying
customer_reviews.text: I lover coffee with milk but trying to do keto, I could not afford the carbs, and with the bullet proof type coffee, I really missed my creamers or milk. So I tried this as my butter in the morning coffee. Flavor was very satisfying, the fat satisfied me and helped with intermittent fasting. A smaller bottle with tight lid would be better for travel, but overall I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma J

customer_reviews.title: Good and Good for me!
customer_reviews.text: This creamy blend is so tasty. Others I tried don't even come close and knowing how good it is for my energy and focus makes jump out of bed and get that first cup of coffee. Thank You Omega Health Products!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Fox-Rowe

customer_reviews.title: ok nice to try - didn't leak when i added the bottle to my purse
customer_reviews.text: i'm on keto, and so using creamer instead of sugar in coffee. today i stopped to buy coffee after fasting for bloodwork and used this bottle. it's new, and i've used it maybe 5 times previously? felt as though i really really had to shake it to get any out, and i don't believe there are truly 20 servings each 1 Tbsp... maybe i need to warm it in microwave, and or open it and loosen w/ spatula. flavor ok-to-good.
customer_reviews.author: dr laura a

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Delicious- Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is delicious! Not sure how I feel about the extra ingredients but will continue to buy. I don't think it is all that expensive- to make a bottle this size would probably cost me about the same!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I've recently started Keto/intermittent fasting. I have no problem not eating in the morning but I really need my coffee and don't like it black. I read up on MCT creamers and liked the ingredients in this one. I got Sweet Vanilla and while I think sweet doesn't really apply, I can detect a hint of vanilla ,I really like the taste and it helps me get thru the morning! I'm going to try the Cocao next. I bought a small frother wand and it works great to mix it in.
customer_reviews.author: Lma

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned with this product and was going to return it but it is not returnable. I am glad though because it is delicious!! I added a tablespoon or two of erithtrol (spelling?). Great replacement for my daily Starbucks and caribou! It's oily so it makes my lips nice and soft haha!! I did get it on my clothes but washed it with hot water and Dawn dish soap and it didn't stain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It gave me reflux and I never get reflux
customer_reviews.text: It's great that this product is shelf-stable. But for me, that is about as far as the greatness goes. I did not particularly like the taste of it but I guess I would have put up with that for the convenience of using it while traveling. Deal breaker is that it caused me to have acid reflux later that night. I never get acid reflux anymore since going keto so I was quite surprised! So I have decided to tip this bottle away and I will not be ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: SylvesterthekatTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: High price - is the issue
customer_reviews.text: This is great - it tastes good and it does what it’s suppose to do. Now the price - it’s expensive I mean we are talking about a creamer right? That is the only downside to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Adds that little something...
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! When I don't want to do the single servings of MCT, butter and heavy cream in my morning coffee I just use 1T of the Omega. I've only bought the Vanilla so I can't really rate the flavor since I always put Cacao and Stevia in too. It does give the coffee a smoother and richer texture. The convenience is great!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty0562

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I originally tried the cinnamon flavor but realized I do not care for the taste of the stevia. This non sweetened version is much better. It is very convenient for me in the mornings to just throw some of this in my coffee. I must admit that it does not taste as creamy as my regular Kerry gold/ coconut oil blend that I use but it is great for being on the go. I bring it when I travel with my portable frother and it does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It’s a preference of thing.
customer_reviews.text: A little extra flavor if you’re used to black coffee, but barely the creaminess I like. It doesn’t doesn’t bad at all and adds a natural sweetness. I still had to add a little half&half to get the creaminess in needed which defeats the purpose for $20. I won’t buy again for that reason alone. The calories are too high as well if your counting.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Vandergriff

customer_reviews.title: Nasty stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this creamer as I had just started my keto diet. I bought 2 bottles. 1 Pumpkin Spice and 1 Vanilla flavor. Just a horrible flavor and very bitter. Too bad really. At $19 a bottle, it's very overpriced but I was prepared to pay it for a good flavor creamer. They need a new recipe to be sure. Not recommended and I won't be buying anymore.
customer_reviews.author: doug earp

customer_reviews.title: Great for Keto!
customer_reviews.text: I use this creamer in my coffee every morning. I alternate between the cacao and the vanilla. The taste is pretty good and I love the convenience! The only negative I have experienced was my last shipment came and the bottles leaked. The seal on the inside was not sealed well. There was an oily mess all inside the box and the bow was falling apart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and better priced than most
customer_reviews.text: From many Amazon reviewers' advice I tried this more affordable Keto creamer which included MCT oil, ghee, organic coconut oil and stevia. It is amazing....it blends well, tastes great and is so easy to use, Put a teaspoon or tablespoon (Build up to it) in your coffee or tea blend and voila it's ready to drink. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nimue

customer_reviews.title: Lack of Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I am unimpressed with the flavor or better yet, the lack thereof. The serving size did not produce any flavor for my coffee, which was one of the main reasons I purchased this product. I will continue to use the product for the other benefits that it can provide that align with my "keto" eating plan. Also, although it arrived with the seal seemingly intact, there was oil on the outside of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: AmberRae

customer_reviews.title: Quick and tasty
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my ninja bullet blender. I add coffee, a scoop of protein powder, a spoonful of this, and top off with heavy cream. I really enjoy it and it's not greasy. Love that it doesn't have to be refrigerated.
customer_reviews.author: Astra Luna

customer_reviews.title: Can’t taste the vanilla
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say it’s bad and I can’t say it’s good but what I can say is I can hardly taste the vanilla and the small bottle seemed over priced. I prefer to make my bullet proof coffee with Mct oil, heavy cream, a table spoon of Keri gold butter and black coffe with a smidge of swerve. Taste way better this way.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha

customer_reviews.title: Completes your wake up!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it combines all the good/necessary fats in one place. Dissolved easily: I don’t have access to a blender when I travel but this dissolves easily with some brisk stirring. I’m a flight attendant and always have to get up at 1 or 2 in the morning ‘my time’ when on an east coast trip. This definitely helps finish the wake up process!!! I forgot it on my last trip and boy was I dragging!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Strand

customer_reviews.title: Def not a creamer and not enough vanilla flavor
customer_reviews.text: It is convenient. HOWEVER Does not taste like vanilla one bit. Tried the cacao too and it was horrible. Way too expensive for non organic ingredients and 20 servings. Definitely not a creamer. Company is trying to get you hooked on subscription with 20 servings per bottle. Bit shady. Make it 30 unless the avg # of days in a month has changed.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Good for Keto Diet
customer_reviews.text: It's really good. Definitely helps with maintain ketosis. Easy to use. I guess the high price tag makes up for not making my own butter coffee. I still need to add a little sweetener (as I'm not a black coffee drinker) but not much!
customer_reviews.author: J. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Convenient product but cant get with all the flavors/texture
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to the Bulletproof coffee lifestyle.. this was my first purchase I thought the ghee/oil/flavoring in a single product would be ideal and convenient. The vanilla flavor was fine but I can’t quite get past the butter flavor. I found the key is to blend with my coffee in a countertop blender which made it frothy, and drink it quickly or else it will separate again. I understand it.. but I don’t love it. Maybe it’s not my thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not cream.....
customer_reviews.text: When I bought it, I thought it would like a real creamer or half ‘n half substitute. I was disappointed to find out it wasn’t. I could never imagine drinking black coffee. However, to my surprise, I’ve been drinking it in my coffee with not much of a problem. The alternative was putting whipping cream in my coffee. I’m sure this Keto “creamer” is much healthier, so i’m sticking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lin H. Fryman

customer_reviews.title: Easy is important but taste is more important
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this now for about a year. I love my bulletproof coffee a this creamer makes it so easy to make even when traveling. The taste is great or I would go back to the complicated way of making it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: The taste is great, but the consistency is totally different from the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered this product. The taste is great, but the consistency is totally different from the first purchase. The first was much thicker. This is very runny. Not sure if I will reorder. Not sure which is the normal product
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy E. Grupe

customer_reviews.title: High Calories - tastes bad!
customer_reviews.text: Since the product had stevia in it, I was surprised that it was 160 calories per Tablespoon. Admittedly, I only tried it once because it tasted so bad, I immediately threw it in the trash can. No way am I drinking something that with that many calories unless it is totally delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The Cacao flavor I used is pretty good. You must use a handheld frother or mixer to get this mixed well and it makes a good fat-coffee for Keto diet. You can probably get the 3-4 ingredients separately and mix them yourself cheaper... but the convenience of this product make it easy to use specially at the office.
customer_reviews.author: Hossein Nik

customer_reviews.title: Flavoring for my morning Bulletproof coffee
customer_reviews.text: Definitely doesn't taste anything like traditional vanilla creamer but that is to be expected. It gave my morning coffee some flavor which I have been missing since I started keto. My only complaint is that it doesn't blend well in cold coffee so I can only use it in my hot coffee. Other than that, I like it a lot and am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Niedecken

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my keto coffee! I think the taste is great! It's pretty expensive so I don't use it everyday. Plus I don't like drinking keto coffee everyday either. I use it 2-3 times per week and it does make my coffee taste great. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: It is an acquired taste that’s for sure. It just sits at the top though and doesn’t distribute very well. Definitely does not work with ice coffee. You’ll just get like fat chunks throughout. If you’re on keto just stick to regular heavy cream and stevia. Less calories and better taste too
customer_reviews.author: Mireiyah

customer_reviews.title: Great Ingredients, Not Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Vanilla. The ingredients look great for Keto, the fat is good, but the taste is not the best. Tried it in iced coffee, that did not go well. Then tried it in a hot coffee and still could not get over the taste of it. Can taste the weird flavor through other additions like heavy cream and sugar free syrups. Unhappy about that because I expected to not need to add anything else but this to my coffee, bought it to make convenient fat coffee at work.
customer_reviews.author: 3laine_M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: OMG, this is amazing, brewed 8oz if coffee in my Keurig, placed in blender ! BAM GREAT CUP OF KETO JOE
customer_reviews.author: beauti4ash

customer_reviews.title: They almost kill me
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this, don’t buy this, don’t buy this product is not pure coconut oil is mixed with almonds oil I end up at the hospital almost die false list of ingredients.please be aware don’t buy this product if you allergic to almond also the ghee butter is mixed with regular milk don’t buy at less you wanted to die don’t waist your 20$ Don’t buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: So good! Amazingly tasty on other things
customer_reviews.text: Well....in my coffee, not so much, but on pancakes, OMG! So good! Amazingly tasty on other things, but I can’t stand it in my coffee. The search for a carb free coffee creamer that tastes good continues.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Bulletproof in one step.
customer_reviews.text: I read quite a lot about Bulletproof coffee and how it was made and saw this product that just needed to be added to coffee. I wasn't sure what it would be like but found that I love it. It's got everything in it that is needed for this kind of coffee and it very easy. I have a cup first thing every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Oliver

customer_reviews.title: I won't be buying it again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product twice. It was recommended to me and the first time I purchased it I fell in love with it. The vanilla flavor came through and the consistency was creamy. The 2nd order wasn't the same. I can't taste the vanilla flavor and it's more oil than anything. The consistency is totally different than the first bottle. Not happy since this is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: sh

customer_reviews.title: BPC Made Easy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the original!! I have it on auto ship because I love it so much! It honestly has no flavor so it doesn't change the taste at all. I truly enjoy black coffee and the orginal let's me still enjoy that dark roast flavor. If you're a fan of sweet flavors I can't help you...I've only used the original flavor, sorry!
customer_reviews.author: CynthiaS.

customer_reviews.title: Bullet Coffee WITHOUT the blender!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS product makes my coffee complete!! Instead of me adding in the butter, the coconut oil, ,,, I now only have one container. Also this is great for travel and I’ve shared with my family and friends. They are now ordering it also. I love the richness it adds to my coffee. The plain butter is my favorite, my friends and dil, prefer the vanilla but, I don’t care for the sweetness.
customer_reviews.author: KViator

customer_reviews.title: Just....NO.
customer_reviews.text: I hate when I get suckered by great reviews. I ordered this creamer based on good reviews but now feel like I tore up a $20 bill. I was looking to change up my coffee routine with a new flavor and good MCT fat. What I got was an unappetizing oil-slicked coffee that I immediately tossed down the drain. So frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: great stuff.
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff. had it before. first time ordering through amazon. the photo shows how it arrived, as it leaked all through the package. should ari e better sealed. missed out on a serving or 2 and for $20 a bottle, that kinda blows.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Stallkamp

customer_reviews.title: ITS JUST BUTTER
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted cream for my coffee but it's not cream, it's literary fat in a bottle lol. I am sure it will be good for people on the move and you don't want to put butter in your coffee and have people think your crazy. Not a good taste but not bad. You must have something to blend it with .... a spoon will not due.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Trammell

customer_reviews.title: awesome Flavor in my coffee
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fits right into my keto diet regime. Most importantly this is replacing my chocolate milk that I used to put in my coffee before this new lifestyle I'm living ;-) I use an electric mixer and add heavy whipping cream with my stevia, unsweetened cocoa and YUMMMMMMMMM
customer_reviews.author: J. Steinbrenner

customer_reviews.title: 100% yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff! Easy to take with you and is 100% yummy. The only thing I have trouble with is that it becomes hard to get out of the container. I go thru great lengths, like banging the container, storing it capside down, squeezing and really squeezing and flicking it - till I eventually use the handle of my spoon to scoop it out. I also wish it was a bigger size, as it’s amazing how quickly I seem to go thru it and I’m only putting it in one tablespoon to a 20oz coffee. Regardless of those things, the product is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Christine L. Peck

customer_reviews.title: tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I love putting this in my coffee in the morning. It gives me energy and a clear mind to do my work. It tastes great and mixes in the coffee very well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but for what it is and what it’s meant to do this one is great. Very tasty and easy to mix and drink
customer_reviews.text: Bulletproof coffee is not for everyone, not everyone can tolerate it, but for what it is and what it’s meant to do this one is great. Very tasty and easy to mix and drink. Adding a little heavy cream makes it even better. I have gone back and ordered more of this. For the keto diet it’s a must have and the best keto coffee “creamer” I have used so far. I usually add a little more sweetner and a few squirts of liquid mct oil I have to beef up the fat content even more.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi510

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hard to find anywhere else?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bullet-proof coffee with just a squirt. Even my 'black-coffee-only' husband loved this later in the day as a perfect latte. I prefer the vanilla or the plain, both are awesome. I even add my hazelnut stevia and 1 Tbls Horizon organic heavy whipping cream with just 1 Tbls of Omega PowerCreamer and my Starbucks caramel macchiato are a thing of my past!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Going on a road trip and being on a keto ...
customer_reviews.text: Going on a road trip and being on a keto diet is hard. continually doing coffee stops. My husband was so grateful for this coffee creamer.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn_perkins

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE THIS!!! No sugar, no fillers or crap ingredients. Just the right amount of flavor with a natural sweetness. This helps me cut my dairy and sugar intake. Really helps me get good fats in my breakfast and regulate my blood sugar.
customer_reviews.author: t.dizon

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected however
customer_reviews.text: It may have been my own ignorance on the product recommended from a YouTuber but I didn’t expect the creamer to be the consistency of melted butter . I won’t buy this again but I believe the product is still high quality it’s just not a creamer by any stretch
customer_reviews.author: D. Bealer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best addition to my coffee in the morning
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best addition to my coffee in the morning! Even better? It's portable and I can take it anywhere with no mess.. I keep a mini battery powered frother with me and can make creamy and delicious coffee whenever the craving hits. I absolutely love Omega PowerCreamer in the mornings. It gives me a great brain boost and energy that lasts until the afternoon. I'll be a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: M. Y. Rosta

customer_reviews.title: To me does not taste anything like vanilla.
customer_reviews.text: arrived and was leaking, cap not on tight thank goodness other items were wrapped well or could have been a disaster. To me does not taste anything like vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Cheatham

customer_reviews.title: Travel worthy
customer_reviews.text: I had to travel and needed a simple and complete way to enjoy my "butter" coffee. This worked great! I loved it and it mixed well in the coffee. I had it shipped to my parents house since it wasn't flight safety size, so I'll get to enjoy it again in a month!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie J Huff

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work in iced coffee
customer_reviews.text: I really was hopeful to try this product. I loved the idea of having everything in a convenient bottle for travel. But unfortunately it seems to only work in hot coffee. I only drink iced. So this is not for me! I also wouldn’t call it a “creamer”. I still needed to add heavy cream. But I can see it working for someone who drinks black hot coffee. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This creamer is easy to have in the office, since it does not require refrigeration. It pours easy and mixes somewhat like butter. It also gives your coffee a buttery texture and flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Greene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tasty - had a heavy cream lover try this and he is now using only this in his coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Good product, too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Tasted as expected. The vanilla flavor was not overwhelming. A little expensive to keep buying but I am happy I tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Scrubtech

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for work
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this to make it easier to make bullet proof coffee at work. It's a bit expensive but a whole lot easier then trying to store & mix ingredients separately at work. If your like me and don't chug your coffee, you will need to use a mixing tool if u don't want it to separate. (Taste) I'm not a big Stevia fan and found I need to add a little Erythritol to it along w/ heavy cream to balance the taste. (Traveling) - I can see how this will work for car travel but to big to take on the plane :( . Still searching for a convenient travel option.
customer_reviews.author: LivingLifeDMV

customer_reviews.title: Omega Power Creamer
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the taste of any of these creamers and could not stand the oil in the coffee. I blended the creamer until it was all mixed but this creamer was not a winner for me and I threw all of them away.
customer_reviews.author: dspiers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my bulletproof coffee
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! Would love it more if it were a different flavor than vanilla. Overall, the way it mixes into my hot coffee is perfect, not overpowering with anything, I really enjoy the ghee. Has a good taste, but would prefer hazelnut. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Shiapia

customer_reviews.title: Makes having 'butter'/bulletproof coffee super easy
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Easy to use. Very portable. I have a jar at work and one at home. No more measuring or screwing around with a block of butter and a jar of coconut oil
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: Delicious vanilla taste and don’t let the calories fool you! Unlike coffee creamers!
customer_reviews.text: So tasty!!! Just a tablespoon or less, however your liking, it’s still yummy. I add a packet of Splenda, and it’s delicious! I’m on this diet with Noom, and it’s consodered healthy! I’ll order more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Banana

customer_reviews.title: best ever
customer_reviews.text: So good and mixes well tastes delirious, I bring this t work so I can mix it in my coffee, I bought a battery powered little mixer so can use it at work with the creamer to blend in my coffee!!
customer_reviews.author: sadie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come out of the bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This creamer is too thick for the type of bottle it is in. Could not get the bottom 2/3rd out without scraping with a spoon. Disappointed. Pretty good product, Not worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond65

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste
customer_reviews.text: My regular brand is not in stock so I thought I'd try this based on the many reviews that favored the taste. Clearly, I have different taste buds than those reviewers. I blended it in my frother before adding to coffee, as instructed, but it was just a weird and unpleasant taste. There was nothing vanilla or coconut about it. It was all I could do to finish that cup. Off to find something else until my brand is back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Omega PowerCreamer - French Vanilla Keto Coffee Creamer - Grassfed Ghee, MCT Oil, Organic Coconut Oil, Stevia Powder | Liquid Blend | Supports Weight Loss & Energy | Low Carb, Sugar Free (20 Servings)
feature_bullets: KETO CREAMER WITH MCT OIL (FRENCH VANILLA) - Just blend our keto-friendly creamer into your coffee and enjoy! Makes an easy butter coffee (made with grass fed ghee). The PowerCreamer is a liquid blend that is made with premium ingredients. Promotes instant, lasting energy and focus. Can be a stand-alone breakfast meal replacement, or blended in keto shakes, smoothies, or tea. Also can be used as a fat burner for women or men while intermittent fasting.

SUGAR FREE, ORGANIC, GRASS FED INGREDIENTS - Grass fed Ghee (Clarified Butter), Organic Coconut Oil, Medium-Chain Triglyceride Oil (MCT Oil), Natural Flavoring, Organic Stevia Powder, and Non-GMO Sunflower Lecithin - Lactose Free. Casein Free. Zero Carb. Gluten-Free. Paleo. Ketogenic.

100% HEALTHY FATS - KETO DIET FRIENDLY - the PowerCreamer contains 0 Net Carbs, and can be used for Paleo, Weight Loss, Diabetic, & Primal Diets. Can also be a pre-workout or a keto snack for fitness training, crossfit, running, or yoga. For a bonus punch, add collagen peptides (see our Omega Collagen Protein)

BLEND AND ENJOY - Our high fat creamer can quickly be blended or frothed (see our Power Frother - milk frother) to make a healthy coffee or tea. PowerCreamer does not need to be refrigerated. Avoid keeping the product in direct sunlight or in environments with temperatures exceeding 85 degrees Fahrenheit.

LESS THAN $1.00 PER SERVING. 20 SERVINGS. It's the perfect keto coffee creamer for those who travel or with an active lifestyle. Take it on the go or leave a bottle at the office! Also, try it as keto popcorn oil or for keto baking. It is a staple keto food for your morning. Shake well! 100% money-back guarantee.
